name: Al Emmo & the Lost Dutchman's Mine
name_original: Al Emmo & the Lost Dutchman's Mine
description:
Al Emmo & the Lost Dutchman's Mine is an adventure game developed by Himalaya Studios. It came out on 07-09-2006. Himalaya Studios published the game.
Al Emmo & the Lost Dutchman's Mine is available on PC. You can purchase the game on Steam.
